properties.description: Based on the new data that is generated by Joakim.

content.query:
USE costmgmt
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW BusinessAreaLevel
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/AzureAD_BusinessAreaLevel/gold/usersWithBusinessAreaSnapshot_v1.parquet/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
